text:
Machine parts, and other accessories worth about Rs. 40 lakh was stolen from a power loom unit along the Tirupur-Kundadam road.

Unit owner, Ramesh Kumar, said that the theft might have occurred between November 25, 2015 and February 10, as the unit was remaining closed.

The unit had 16 automatic machines, and a lot of spare parts stocked inside the building, he said.
title: Machine parts stolen
